product_name: Isis Acqua Rain Shell Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Stay dry and comfy and look stylish in the women's waterproof, breathable Isis Acqua Rain Shell Jacket with Cocona(R). Polyester shell has a Cocona waterproof, breathable laminate made from natural activated coconut carbon that attracts and pulls away humid body heat. Fully seam-sealed construction keeps water out; durable water repellent finish helps rain bead up and roll off. Waterproof zippers on center front, hand pockets and chest pocket. Sleek, tailored cut is designed specifically for women. Adjustable hem, hood and cuffs seal out weather; laser-cut hook-and-loop cuffs feature adjustable rubberized tabs. Isis Acqua Rain Shell Jacket for women also features a locker loop inside the neck. Closeout.
short_description: Stay dry and comfy and look stylish in the women's waterproof, breathable Isis Acqua Rain Shell Jacket with Cocona(R).
